description:
Aggregate sentences allow the Tester to run multiple sentences in one action
or modify an existing sentence in new ways

elements.name: Test that the user can send login credentials at the specified page

steps.name: the user logged in via "login" with username "username" and password "password"
the page title should be "Logged In"

elements.name: Test that the Test Writer can check the inverse of a sentence

steps.name: the page title should be "Log In"
it is not the case that the page title should be "Logged In"

name: Aggregate Sentences

description:
Capture sentences allow the Tester to capture either screenshots or data
from the page and record it to the report

elements.name: Test that the user can capture content that is on the page

steps.name: write the "Random Number" generated by the system

elements.name: Test that the user can capture a screenshot of the page

steps.name: the browser window is 800 by 600 pixels

name: Capture Sentences

description:
Content sentences allow a tester to verify information that is displayed
in the application

elements.name: The Demo App header contains the text "Hello World"

steps.name: the "Page Header" contains the text "Hello World"

elements.name: The Demo App header does not contain the text "Goodbye World"

steps.name: it is not the case that the "Page Header" contains the text "Goodbye World"

doc_string.value: The "Page Header" was supposed to contain "Goodbye World", but instead had "Hello World".

steps.name: the statement that 'the "Page Header" contains the text "Goodbye World"' responds with

doc_string.value: The "Missing Link" was not found on the page.

steps.name: the statement that 'the "Missing Link" contains the text "Goodbye World"' responds with

elements.name: The Demo App header is visible and the Hidden Content is not
The visibility check has the correct messages

steps.name: it is not the case that the "Page Header" is not visible
it is not the case that the "Hidden Content" is visible

doc_string.value: The "Page Header" was not supposed to be visible but it was.

steps.name: the statement that 'the "Page Header" is not visible' responds with

doc_string.value: The "Hidden Content" was supposed to be visible but it was not.

steps.name: the statement that 'the "Hidden Content" is visible' responds with

doc_string.value: The "Missing Link" was supposed to be visible but it was not present.

steps.name: the statement that 'the "Missing Link" is visible' responds with

elements.name: The Nth item sentence finds the correct item and asserts its text

steps.name: the 2nd label in the "form" contains the text "Optional input"

elements.name: The Nth item sentence has the correct messages

steps.name: it is not the case that the 1nd label in the "form" contains the text "Optional input"
it is not the case that the 2nd label in the "form" contains the text "Required input"

doc_string.value: The 2nd label in the "form" should have contained the text "Required input", but it did not.

steps.name: the statement that 'the 2nd label in the "form" contains the text "Required input"' responds with

doc_string.value: The "form" does not have a 99th label.

steps.name: the statement that 'the 99th label in the "form" contains the text "Required input"' responds with

doc_string.value: The "Missing Link" was not found on the page.

steps.name: the statement that 'the 1st word in the "Missing Link" contains the text "Not"' responds with

elements.name: The Demo App Page Title is "Hello World"

steps.name: the page title should be "Hello World"

doc_string.value: The page title was supposed to be "Goodbye World" but was "Hello World".

steps.name: the statement that 'the page title should be "Goodbye World"' responds with

description:
As a developer
I want to ensure that all of the available test statements work

elements.name: run a simple test

steps.name: behave will test it for us!

elements.name: check that google exists

steps.name: the page title should be "hello world - Google Search"

name: showing off behave
